input_text.Prompt:
Using the product keywords and product specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product specification:
Sea Gull Lighting 61035-777 Metropolis One-Light Mini Pendant, Copper Revival Finish with Satin Etched Glass

Product keywords:
Shade Material: Etched glass.
Shade Color: Satin. 
Distressed: No.
Number of Lights: 1
Connection: Hardwired. 
Plug-In: No. 
Chain or Rod Length: 12".
10 feet of Wire
Requires One Medium A-Line 100-watt maximum bulb
Three Interconnecting 12-Inch stems Included
For Additional Decorative Chain Order: 9100-777
For Additional Stem Order: 9199-777
Canopy Included

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
61035-777 Finish: Copper Revival with a Satin Etched Glass Shade -Shade Material: Etched glass. -Shade Color: Satin. -Distressed: No. -Number of Lights: 1. -Connection: Hardwired. -Plug-In: No. -Chain or Rod Length: 12". It requires One Medium A-Line 100-watt maximum bulb.
Soft curves take on a sleek, hip attitude when paired with Copper Revival and Satin Etched Glass in this Metropolis Collection, One-Light Mini Pendant. The fixture includes Three Interconnecting 12-Inch Stems and 12 inches of Chain with 10 feet of Wire. The canopy is also Included. Additional Decorative Chains and Stems are available (Order: 9199-777) each Sold Separately.
input_text.Response B:
The Sea Gull Lighting Metropolis one-light mini pendant in copper revival is an ENERGY STAR® qualified lighting fixture that uses LED bulbs to save you both time and money. The Metropolis collection by Sea Gull Lighting is defined by its clean lines and dramatic, geometric profile reminiscent of the Art Deco era. The Satin Etched glass shade offers a soft and diffuse light, adding to the overall appeal. The single-light design is perfect for use in a kitchen, dining room, and living room or as a unique focal point in a hallway or stairwell. This pendant light is a great choice for a modern or contemporary home decor.

Attention-Grabbing Headline:
Sea Gull Lighting Metropolis One-Light Mini Pendant, Copper Revival Finish with Satin Etched Glass:

A stunning fixture with a contemporary aesthetic that will add style and elegance to any home.

Interest-Building Paragraph:

The Metropolis collection by Sea Gull Lighting is a modern take on the Art Deco era. The geometric profile of this pendant light is simple and elegant. The satin etched glass shade adds a soft and diffuse light to your space. This fixture is perfect for use in a kitchen, dining room, or living room.

Desire-Inducing Paragraph:

Add a touch of sophistication to your home with this unique, contemporary pendant light. The copper revival finish and satin etched glass shade will complement any home decor style. This pendant light is an excellent choice for a modern or contemporary home.

Action-Oriented Paragraph:

Purchase this Sea Gull Lighting Metropolis One-Light Mini Pendant, Copper Revival Finish with Satin Etched Glass today to add style and elegance to your home. This pendant light is a great choice for any modern or contemporary home decor style.

END SUMMARY
